item.title: Data Cleaning and Exploration
item.description: This blog post covers the steps taken to prepare two home sales data sets for analysis. If youâ€™re only interested in fitting and visualizing multiple models with purrr and broom, skip ahead to that post. Processing the data A single-family home sales dataset and a condo/townhome dataset for Garfield County, Colorado, that contain 2 years of data from summer 2014 through summer 2016. The data is publically available on the Garfield County Assessor website.
